page.title: 26Hobbies
page.content:
Ist Harbury Guides delivered 200 survey sheets to homes in the village in July 2011. Replies were received from 21% of households.

30% of replies were from males, and 70% from females.

All those who replied had hobbies.

Gardening was the most popular hobby, with almost 25% listing it as their prime pastime, with around 30% choosing various sports.

On average, people spend 9 hours a week on their chosen pastime.

The vast majority have a list of other hobbies, many of them involving collecting things, sports, or exercise generally.


1st Harbury Guides
